code: export async function createOrder(_ref){let{baseUrl,registrationId,amount}=_ref;const resp=await fetch(`${baseUrl}/createOrder`,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({registrationId,amount})});if(!resp.ok)throw new Error('Failed to create order');return resp.json();}export async function verifyPayment(_ref2){let{baseUrl,registrationId,razorpay_order_id,razorpay_payment_id,razorpay_signature}=_ref2;const resp=await fetch(`${baseUrl}/verifyPayment`,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({registrationId,razorpay_order_id,razorpay_payment_id,razorpay_signature})});if(!resp.ok)throw new Error('Verification failed');return resp.json();}
